settings.text:
Welcome to Nerd Stuff of Alabama, a business owned and operated by the Hale Brothers - a dynamic duo of passionate Funko Pop! enthusiasts dedicated to bringing you the best selections of comics, manga, Funko Pops!, action figures/statues, and accessories!

Our store boasts an extensive collection of comics dating back to the Bronze Age of Comics, ensuring that there's something for every fan. In addition to our wide range of comics, we also offer an impressive selection of manga, from classic titles to new releases. And let's not forget our love for Funko Pops! We carry a lot of new and rare Funko Pops, so you can be sure to find your favorite characters in our store.

At Nerd Stuff of Alabama, we believe that being a nerd is something to be proud of, and we strive to create a welcoming and inclusive environment where everyone can feel at home. Our team of knowledgeable and friendly staff, led by the Hale Brothers themselves, is always ready to help you find what you're looking for and answer any questions you may have.

So please contact us or shop online for all your comic, manga, and Funko Pop needs. The Hale Brothers and the rest of the Nerd Stuff of Alabama team can't wait to share their passion with you!
